item.title: 狮门公司被养老基金起诉，要求阻止星空卫视分拆
item.description: 全球最大的养老基金之一起诉狮门娱乐公司（Lions Gate Entertainment Corp.【原文：One of the world’s largest pension funds sued Lions Gate Entertainment Corp. to block the movie and television studio from separating from its struggling Starz cable and streaming service via a blank-check merger.】

item.title: 美国海军承包商将支付 2,400 万美元以了结欺诈调查
item.description: 一家美国海军造船厂同意支付 2400 万美元，并承认与长达数年的欺诈行为有关的联邦指控，这些欺诈行为涉及夸大利润、误导投资者和审计师。【原文：A US Navy shipbuilder agreed to pay $24 million and plead guilty to federal charges linked to a yearslong fraud that involved inflating profits and misleading investors and auditors.】

item.title: Dish 母公司 EchoStar 可能需要出售更多频谱支持债券
item.description: 据彭博情报公司（Bloomberg Intelligence）称，EchoStar 公司今年年初提出了一项有争议的债务重组努力，该公司可能需要出售更多由其无线频谱支持的债券，以延长到期日。【原文：EchoStar Corp., which early this year tabled a controversial debt-restructuring effort, may need to sell more bonds backed by its wireless spectrum to extend maturities, according to Bloomberg Intelligence.】

item.title: S&P大选周期权意味着大幅走低的可能性更大
item.description: 现在，投资者要衡量美国总统大选前后的股市情绪，除了 Cboe 波动率指数期货外，还可以直接查看与投票期间挂钩的 S&P 500 指数期权。【原文：Investors trying to gauge the sentiment toward equities around the US presidential election can now look directly at S&P 500 Index options linked to the period of the vote, in addition to Cboe Volatility Index futures.】

item.title: 美联储开始降息后的下一步行动
item.description:
九月之后会发生什么？【原文：

What comes after September?

】

item.title: 天气导致作物状况恶化，谷物期货攀升
item.description: 芝加哥谷物期货上涨，原因是整个农业带天气较差，大豆、玉米和小麦作物状况恶化。【原文：Grains futures rose in Chicago on worsening crop conditions for soybean, corn and wheat amid poorer weather across the farm belt.】

item.title: GameStop 5 月份备忘录复兴导致零售参与率下降
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）周一公布的交易数据显示，GameStop 公司今年春季第二次成为 "备忘录 "聚光灯下的焦点，但却未能吸引零售交易商的追捧，他们曾在 2021 年让该公司成为家喻户晓的名字。【原文：GameStop Corp.’s second turn in the meme spotlight this spring failed to attract the herd of retail traders who made the company a household name in 2021, according to trade data released Monday by the Securities and Exchange Commission.】

item.title: 美国银行客户三周来首次抛售股票
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的客户三周来首次从美股撤资，减少了他们在继续徘徊在创纪录水平附近的资产类别中的风险敞口。【原文：Bank of America Corp. clients pulled money from US stocks for the first time in three weeks, paring their exposure in the asset class that continued to hover near a record.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称法拉利将延续破纪录涨势
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）分析师认为，法拉利公司今年的表现优于竞争对手的汽车制造商和奢侈品品牌，这是对其 "强烈的品牌忠诚度 "和低中国市场风险的回报。【原文：Ferrari NV’s outperformance of rival carmakers and luxury-goods brands this year is a reward for its “fierce brand loyalty” and low exposure to China, according to Morgan Stanley analysts, who see the shares extending their record-setting gains.】

item.title: 埃克森寻求以 10 亿美元出售二叠纪常规资产
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp. ）正在寻求出售二叠纪盆地的一揽子常规石油资产，因为该公司在今年早些时候收购了先锋自然资源公司（Pioneer Natural Resources Co.【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. is looking to sell a package of conventional oil assets in the Permian Basin as the company focuses on growing shale production after buying Pioneer Natural Resources Co. earlier this year.】

item.title: 美国大选前急于举债的市政债券优惠多多
item.description: 由于承销商希望以诱人的条款吸引投资者，因此在市政债券市场上，讨价还价者有很多选择。【原文：Bargain hunters have a lot to choose from in the municipal bond market as underwriters look to lure in investors with attractive terms.】

item.title: 北极液化天然气二厂七月运行增至三倍，为出口做准备
item.description: 俄罗斯的北极液化天然气 2 项目不顾美国的限制，在准备开始液化天然气出口之际，于 7 月份大幅提高了加工量。【原文：Russia’s Arctic LNG 2 project sharply hiked processing in July as it prepared to start liquefied-gas exports, defying US restrictions.】

item.title: 英伟达预计耗资 3100 亿美元的举措将带来更广泛的回报
item.description:
巨型芯片制造商在周三收盘后公布财报

。【原文：

Giant chipmaker reports earnings after Wednesday’s market close

】

item.title: 能源交易热潮退去，贡渥集团上半年利润减半
item.description: 贡渥集团（Gunvor Group Ltd.）公布了自 2021 年以来利润最低的上半年业绩，这是能源贸易公司利润率从历史高位回落的最新证据。【原文：Gunvor Group Ltd. posted its lowest first-half profit since 2021, the latest evidence of how margins for energy trading houses are coming off record highs.】

item.title: 墨西哥比索下挫，司法改革首战告捷
item.description: 墨西哥比索周二在主要同类货币中领跌，此前一个重要的国会委员会批准了安德烈斯-曼努埃尔-洛佩斯-奥夫拉多尔总统全面整顿国家司法机构的计划，投资者认为这一变化对这个拉美国家的法治构成了威胁。【原文：The Mexican peso led losses among major peers Tuesday after a key congressional committee approved President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador’s full plan to overhaul the nation’s judiciary, a change investors see as a threat to the rule of law in the Latin American country.】

item.title: 股价暴跌后，巴宝莉将结束在富时 100 指数长达 15 年的排名
item.description: 巴宝莉集团（Burberry Group Plc）准备退出富时 100 指数，结束这家奢侈品制造商在英国蓝筹股中长达 15 年的地位。【原文：Burberry Group Plc is poised to exit the FTSE 100 Index, ending the luxury-goods maker’s 15-year stay in the UK blue-chip gauge.】

item.title: 梅洛尼寻求削减预算以填补意大利 120 亿欧元的资金缺口
item.description: 据知情人士透露，意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）及其联盟正在寻求通过削减成本和延迟退休等措施来填补120亿欧元（约合134亿美元）的预算缺口。【原文：Italian premier Giorgia Meloni and her coalition are seeking to fill a €12 billion-euro ($13.4 billion) budget hole with measures such as cost cuts and delayed retirement, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 投资者为大选前美国垃圾债的最后一搏做好准备
item.description: 9 月和 10 月初可能是美国投资者购买今年新发行的高收益债券的最后机会。【原文：September and the beginning of October might be the last opportunity that US investors have to buy newly issued high-yield debt this year.】

item.title: 桥水聘请前安大略养老金首席信息官欣多担任高级顾问
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，桥水联合公司（Bridgewater Associates）将聘请加拿大最大的养老基金之一的前首席投资官齐亚德-欣多（Ziad Hindo）担任其新的总体投资组合策略部门的高级顾问。【原文：Bridgewater Associates is bringing on Ziad Hindo, the former chief investment officer of one of Canada’s largest pension funds, as a senior adviser in its new total portfolio strategies department, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 萨哈林工程结束后俄罗斯原油流量创两个月新高
item.description:
在欧佩克+（OPEC+）决定从 10 月起放宽减产措施之前提振

。【原文：

Boost comes ahead of OPEC+ decision on easing output cuts from October

】

item.title: 马克龙访问塞尔维亚即将达成法国战斗机销售协议
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）即将达成向塞尔维亚出售达索公司（Dassault Aviation SA）生产的阵风战斗机的协议。【原文：Emmanuel Macron is closing in on a deal to sell Rafale fighter jets made by Dassault Aviation SA to Serbia, according to people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 新信贷经理人 CCS Partners 募集 40 亿美元用于交易
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，CCS Partners 是一家专注于结构性和私人资产交易的信贷管理公司，该公司于本月成立，并筹集了 40 亿美元的资金。【原文：CCS Partners, a credit manager focused on structured and private asset-based deals, launched this month and raised $4 billion in commitments, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Benefit Street、Diameter 与 Stifel 成立私人信贷合资公司
item.description: Stifel Financial Corp. 正在与包括富兰克林资源公司（Franklin Resources Inc.【原文：Stifel Financial Corp. is forming a new direct-lending joint venture with partners including a credit manager owned by Franklin Resources Inc. amid a growing wave of such partnerships.】

item.title: 为什么真主党对以色列的威胁大于哈马斯？
item.description: 自 10 月 7 日以色列与巴勒斯坦激进组织哈马斯爆发新一轮战争以来，黎巴嫩民兵真主党通过军事行动声援哈马斯。真主党几乎每天都向以色列北部发射导弹、迫击炮弹、火箭弹和爆炸性无人机，促使以色列以牙还牙。8 月下旬，战斗升级，有爆发全面战争的危险。然而，以色列和真主党都有理由避免全面冲突。【原文：Since a new war broke out between Israel and the militant Palestinian group Hamas on Oct. 7, the Lebanese militia Hezbollah has expressed solidarity with Hamas through military action. It has fired missiles, mortars, rockets and explosive drones into northern Israel almost daily, prompting Israel to respond with its own fire. In late August, the fighting escalated, risking an all-out war. Yet both Israel and Hezbollah have reasons to avoid a full-blown conflict.】

item.title: 纽约私立学院因学生人数减少而降低评级
item.description: 惠誉评级公司将圣玛丽山学院的信用等级下调至 BBB，因为学生入学率的持续下降给学校的财务带来了压力。【原文：Mount Saint Mary College saw its credit score cut to BBB by Fitch Ratings, after persistent declines in student enrollment pressured the school’s finances.】

item.title: 美联储押注助推 2024 年拉美地方债务最佳月份
item.description: 随着美联储日益临近自大流行病爆发以来的首次降息，拉丁美洲的本币债券正创下今年以来最强劲的月度涨幅。【原文：Latin America’s local-currency bonds are staging the strongest monthly advance this year as the Federal Reserve draws closer to cutting interest rates for the first time since the onset of the pandemic.】

item.title: 卢克石油公司禁令下俄罗斯 7 月输往匈牙利和斯洛伐克的石油运输正常
item.description: 尽管基辅对卢克石油股份公司（Lukoil PJSC）实施了制裁，但由于塔特石油股份公司（Tatneft PJSC）介入替代了大部分缺失的原油桶，7 月份俄罗斯通过乌克兰向匈牙利和斯洛伐克出口的原油仍保持在正常水平。【原文：Russia’s crude oil exports to Hungary and Slovakia via Ukraine remained within normal levels in July despite Kyiv’s sanctions on Lukoil PJSC, as Tatneft PJSC stepped in to replace the bulk of the missing barrels.】

item.title: 巴拉圭财政部长认为投资级资产为交易提供了动力
item.description: 巴拉圭财政部长卡洛斯-费尔南德斯（Carlos Fernandez）在接受采访时说，巴拉圭最近首次进入投资级信用评级领域，这可能会掀起一轮交易热潮，因为当地的家族企业希望通过引入外国资本和公司治理专业知识来实现业务现代化。【原文：Paraguay’s recent debut into the world of investment grade credit rating could kick off a round of dealmaking as local family-run corporations look to modernize their operations by embracing foreign capital and corporate governance expertise, Finance Minister Carlos Fernandez said in an interview.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气油需求预计将低于科维德封锁水平
item.description: 由于制造业的疲软和该地区汽车队的结构性转变，今年欧洲对汽油的需求将跌破 19 科维德事件的深度。【原文：Demand for gasoil in Europe is set to plunge below the depths of Covid-19 this year, as weak manufacturing and structural shifts in the region’s car fleet take their toll.】

item.title: CME 推出较小的比特币 "星期五期货 "合约，以吸引散户投资者
item.description: 芝加哥商品交易所集团（CME Group Inc.【原文：CME Group Inc. is launching a smaller Bitcoin futures contract in a bid to appeal to retail investors who may be priced out of the exchange’s existing crypto offerings.】
